gui.comment_under_title_pls_report:
If you've added extra mods, they may be outdated or incompatible, which caused this crash.

Need help?
gui.comment_under_title: 1) Join Fabulously Optimized Discord. 2) Create a new post in #support, describe what you were doing before the crash. 3) Upload and copy the first log from the list below. 4) Paste the link in your support thread. 5) Wait for help. We'll tell you if we need more logs or other information.
gui.privacy.consent_not_given: Crash Assistant already asks you before uploading logs.
gui.privacy.consent_reset_success: Crash Assistant will now ask you before uploading logs.
gui.privacy.declined: You chose not to upload your log. You can still share the file manually, or click the button again.
gui.privacy.logs_upload_question: Your log will be uploaded to mclo.gs, which removes some identifying information and stores the log for 90 days. Do you accept the $LINK.PRIVACY_POLICY$?
